functionDecorators.name: add
functionDecorators.description: Add a new LP to the pool. Can only be called by the owner. DO NOT add the same LP token more than once. Rewards will be messed up if you do.

parameterDecorators.name: allocPoint
parameterDecorators.description: AP of the new pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _lpToken
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the LP ERC-20 token.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewarder
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the rewarder delegate.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Deposit LP tokens to MCV2 for reward allocation.

parameterDecorators.name: pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: LP token amount to deposit.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: The receiver of `amount` deposit benefit.

functionDecorators.name: emergencyWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY.

parameterDecorators.name: pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: Receiver of the LP tokens.

functionDecorators.name: harvest
functionDecorators.description: Harvest proceeds for transaction sender to `to`.

parameterDecorators.name: pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: Receiver of rewards.

functionDecorators.name: lpToken
functionDecorators.description: Address of the LP token for each MCV2 pool.

functionDecorators.name: massUpdatePools
functionDecorators.description: Update reward variables for all pools. Be careful of gas spending!.

parameterDecorators.name: pids
parameterDecorators.description: Pool IDs of all to be updated. Make sure to update all active pools.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: pendingReward
functionDecorators.description: View function to see pending reward on frontend.

parameterDecorators.name: _pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: Address of user.

functionDecorators.name: poolLength
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of MCV2 pools.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: rewarder
functionDecorators.description: Address of each `IRewarder` contract in MCV2.

functionDecorators.name: set
functionDecorators.description: Update the given pool's reward allocation point and `IRewarder` contract. Can only be called by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

parameterDecorators.name: _allocPoint
parameterDecorators.description: New AP of the pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewarder
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the rewarder delegate.

parameterDecorators.name: overwrite
parameterDecorators.description: True if _rewarder should be `set`. Otherwise `_rewarder` is ignored.

functionDecorators.name: setRewardPerSecond
functionDecorators.description: Sets the reward per second to be distributed. Can only be called by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewardPerSecond
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of reward to be distributed per second.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updatePool
functionDecorators.description: Update reward variables of the given pool.

parameterDecorators.name: pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

returnDecorators.name: pool
returnDecorators.description: Returns the pool that was updated.

functionDecorators.name: userInfo
functionDecorators.description: Info of each user that stakes LP tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: LP token amount to withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: Receiver of the LP tokens.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawAndHarvest
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw LP tokens from MCV2 and harvest proceeds for transaction sender to `to`.

parameterDecorators.name: pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: LP token amount to withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: Receiver of the LP tokens and rewards.
